pages.text: $(li)The Creeper Spores, when is used, it creates an area with green particles.$(br)$(li)In this area, it will appears multiple Creepiers.$(br)$(li)This tiny creatures will follow you and they will follow and explote to the creature that you attack.
$(li)It can be used to craft Mischief Arrows, a Blast-Proof Plating, a Spore Bomb, or a Creeper Spore Sack.
